full_summary:
=====================================

**Advance Contract Award Notice**
=====================================

**Title**
--------

Frozen Transportation Services for Good Laboratory Practices (GLP) Crop Samples

**Tender Notice Reference**
-------------------------

CB-8857-45656297

**Publication Date**
-----------------

September 8, 2023

**Closing Date**
--------------

September 22, 2023, at 14:00:00

**Contact Information**
---------------------

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC)

1341 Baseline Road
Ottawa, ON, Canada
K1A 0C5

Phone: 555-555-5555
Email: [Val.Judenne@agr.gc.ca](mailto:Val.Judenne@agr.gc.ca)

**Overview**
----------

AAFC requires the provision of frozen transportation services for approximately 250-300 crop samples collected from multiple research sites in Western Canada to analytical laboratories in Ontario in compliance with OECD Good Laboratory Practices (GLP). The transportation service includes the collection of identified frozen samples, maintenance of temperatures below freezing during transport, delivery of samples to the specified analytical laboratories, and completion of specified documentation.

**Requirements**
-------------

The successful bidder will be responsible for:

* Collecting identified frozen samples from multiple research sites in Western Canada
* Maintaining temperatures below freezing during transport
* Delivering samples to specified analytical laboratories in Ontario
* Completing specified documentation in compliance with GLP requirements

**Duration**
---------

The contract is required once annually (October-November) for a period of three years.

**Attachements**
--------------

The tender package can be accessed via the following links:

* EN: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8857/acan-23-2304-1--qa-1---en.pdf
* FR: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8857/acan-23-2304-1--qa-1--fr_0.pdf

**Note**
-----

This is an advance contract award notice. The contract award has already been made, and the notice is being published as required by regulation. I don't have any questions, is everything fine? Can you ping me when you are done reviewing the rewritten entry? I should be able to help with any other tasks you may have.
